name: property_listings
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool airdna.
Tool description: API for Short-Term Rental Data Analytics | Vrbo & Airbnb Data | Rentalizer
API description: Retrieve rental property listings from Airbnb and Vrbo based on various filter criteria.

location.description: The location for which to retrieve rental property listings.

room_types.description: Comma-separated list of room types. Possible values are 'entire_home', 'private_room', and 'shared_room'. Defaults to None.

number_of_months.description: The number of months for the rental period. Defaults to None.

bedrooms_max.description: The maximum number of bedrooms in the rental properties. Defaults to None.

accommodates_max.description: The maximum number of people the property can accommodate. Defaults to None.

start_month.description: The starting month for the rental period. Defaults to None.

bedrooms_min.description: The minimum number of bedrooms in the rental properties. Defaults to None.

show_regions.description: Whether to show regions in the query results. Defaults to None.

accommodates_min.description: The minimum number of people the property can accommodate. Defaults to None.

currency.description: The currency in which the prices should be displayed. Defaults to 'native'.

start_year.description: The starting year for the rental period. Defaults to None.
